p: Any framework for estimating the SCC and optimal mitigation effort has two prerequisites with respect to population: ( i) Emissions pressure: Analyses must explicitly account for a range of plausible future population growth rates—which have proved difficult to estimate even over relatively short time periods ( 4)—and their corresponding links with greenhouse gas emissions. ( ii) A social objective: There must be a consistent and transparent approach for valuing the wellbeing of future populations through time.
